creditline: Bequest of Dan Fellows Platt, Class of 1895

texts.textentryhtml:
Dan Fellows Platt (1873 -1938), Englewood, NJ, possibly by 1909; by descent to Ethel Bliss Platt (1881-1971) [1]; 1962 gift to Princeton University Art Museum.

Notes 

[1] Dan Fellows Platt left his collections to the University but gave his wife life-tenure and the right to sell
